failed_criteria: No screens displaying sensitive information toward public area
action_plan: Reposition or turn off screens behind the counter so that sensitive information is not visible to the public.
visual_feedback: Monitor at the rightmost station shows a white document screen visible through the glass facing the customer side.

failed_criteria: No confidential info, passwords, or personal data visible to customers
action_plan: Remove or relocate any documents or forms containing personal or confidential information from customer view; store them securely.
visual_feedback: The paper document posted on the glass at the left teller station displays potential confidential information in the customer sightline.
